parameter.name: remote
parameter.label: Access Remote Repository
parameter.description: Defines whether openHAB should access the remote repository for add-on installation.

parameter.name: includeIncompatible
parameter.label: Include (Potentially) Incompatible Add-ons
parameter.description: Some add-on services may provide add-ons where compatibility with the currently running system is not expected. Enabling this option will include these entries in the list of available add-ons.

parameter.name: suggestionFinderUpnp
parameter.label: UPnP Suggestion Finder
parameter.description: Use UPnP network scan to suggest add-ons. Enabling/disabling may take up to 1 minute.

parameter.name: suggestionFinderMdns
parameter.label: mDNS Suggestion Finder
parameter.description: Use mDNS network scan to suggest add-ons. Enabling/disabling may take up to 1 minute.

parameter.name: suggestionFinderIp
parameter.label: IP-based Suggestion Finder
parameter.description: Use IP network discovery broadcasts to suggest add-ons. Enabling/disabling may take up to 1 minute.
